The "Dry Resin Technology" helps insulate and protect internal components from moisture and vibration.

content.body: It transforms the 12V battery voltage into 20,000â€“40,000 volts needed to create a spark at the spark plug. This spark ignites the air-fuel mixture in the engine's combustion chamber, enabling engine operation.
